name: firebombing
content:

an attack with a firebomb (= a bomb that causes destruction by starting a fire rather than exploding): There were shootings and firebombings directed at their community. There is a broad spectrum of animal rights activities that range from lawful protests to firebombing.
More examplesFewer examplesA gang leader was prosecuted for murder after ordering the firebombing of a judge's home.After the firebombing, police found two other suitcases with undetonated explosives on the train.Firebombing is terrorism, plain and simple.
